title: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations         NPS Photo  Ranger Interpretative Talk - Battle of the Little Bighorn. click here..... http://wn.com/cspan_visit      See and hear about the Battle of the Little Bighorn on our podcasts.              Setting the Stage   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 58 seconds  Little Bighorn National Monument. Part One of three podcasts. Events That Led to The Battle of the Little Bighorn on June 25th 1876.                The Battle   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:3 minutes, 50 seconds  Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument. Part Two of three podcasts. Lt.Col George Armstrong Custer's Command of 12 companies engaging Sioux and Northern Cheyenne forces. Five Companies of 210 soldiers and Officers annihilated in the first stage of the battle.                The Aftermath and the Monument   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 47 seconds  Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument. Part Three of three podcasts. A victorious battle for the Sioux and Northern Cheyenne but later they and all tribes through out the plains lost the war. Confine to the reservations they struggle to the new way of life.                The Aftermath   Loading the player...    Transcript Staff of Little Bighorn Battlefield will post transcripts in the near future.
